alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; Central Mountains; San Rafael Swell (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:21PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Emery and east central Sevier Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 321 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 27 miles northwest of Hanksville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ferron, Emery and Moore. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 89 and 130. Utah Route 10 between mile markers 0 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Castle Country; Central Mountains; San Rafael Swell
